def_cn: 刻意迎合大多数人的计划（或政策）
def_en: If you describe a plan or policy as the lowest common denominator, you are critical of it because it has been deliberately made too simple so that nobody will disagree.
If you say that something is designed to appeal to the lowest common denominator, you are critical of it because it is designed to be liked by the majority of people.
In mathematics, the lowest common denominator is the smallest number that all the numbers on the bottom of a particular group of fractions can be divided into.
